definition: Straits Exchange Foundation (SEF)/abbr. to 海基會|海基会[Hai3 ji1 hui4]
pinyin: Hai3 xia2 Jiao1 liu2 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: private equity fund/fund offered to private placement (e.g. hedge fund)

sentences.english: To establish a fund for replacing depreciable assets.
sentences.chinese: 设立一个基金来替代折旧的资产。

sentences.english: Under the budget proposal, hedge-fund managers would be taxed at higher rates.
sentences.chinese: 根据预算方案，对冲基金经理将按更高的税率缴税。

sentences.english: And they should carry on the self-innovation constantly and pay attention to form the fund brand.
sentences.chinese: 并且要不断进行自我创新，注重打造基金品牌。

sentences.english: One possibility: tapping state disability funds.
sentences.chinese: 一种可能就是利用州伤病基金。

sentences.english: I have kept a reserve fund in case of accidents.
sentences.chinese: 我已筹备了一笔准备基金以防不测。

sentences.english: The Fund's selection in Capital Goods and Energy detracted performance.
sentences.chinese: 我们于资本财货及能源行业的选股表现影响基金价值。

sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天邻基金会捐赠550张轮椅河南省沁阳市残疾人士。

sentences.english: Romania and Hungary are operating under I.M.F.
sentences.chinese: 罗马尼亚和匈牙利正在接受国际货币基金组织的救助。

sentences.english: Prior to GSR, Sonny was the co-founder of Asia Wireless Technology Corp.
sentences.chinese: 创立金沙江基金以前，伍伸俊是亚洲无线科技创始人。

sentences.english: Oneway to invest is through mutual funds.
sentences.chinese: 一种投资方法就是通过共同基金。

sentences.english: Have you been interviewed for a post with Youchange Foundation?
sentences.chinese: 您以前是否面试过友成基金会的其他职位？

sentences.english: He contributed half of his savings to the relief fund.
sentences.chinese: 他将积蓄的一半捐献给救济基金会。

sentences.english: She remembered a movement called the Rosenwald Fund.
sentences.chinese: 她想起一个动作称为Rosenwald基金。

sentences.english: Custodian fee of fund is set aside every day and paid every month.
sentences.chinese: 基金托管费每日计提，按月支付。

sentences.english: The fund invests principally in German equity securities.
sentences.chinese: 本基金首要投资于德国股票证券。

sentences.english: The close-ended fund meets the serious challenge on the securities market.
sentences.chinese: 封闭式基金在证券市场的运作上遇到严重的挑战。

definition: private equity fund/fund offered to private placement (e.g. hedge fund)
